short_summary: Request for Information for Regional In-Building Wired Local Networks
description: The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking information from industry partners regarding the procurement of Regional In-Building Wired Local Networks. This procurement is for the purpose of defining the scope of the requirement for wired Local Area Network (LAN) products and services for the Networks and Security Services Branch (NSSB).
full_summary:
=====================================================

### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title:

* English: Request for Information for Regional In-Building Wired Local Networks
* French: Demande de renseignements pour les réseaux locaux filaires réseaux intra-bâtit câblés régionaux

#### Solicitation Number:

* BPM019291/23459

#### Publication Date:

* 2023-08-09

#### Tender Closing Date:

* 2023-09-08T15:00:00

#### Aim:

Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking to engage industry through consultation on its interest, capacity, and ability to supply and deliver the requirements for Regional In-Building Wired Local Networks.

#### Objective:

The objective of this document is to define the scope of SSC's requirement for wired Local Area Network (LAN) goods and services for the Networks and Security Services Branch (NSSB).

#### How to Participate:

Interested suppliers can engage with SSC through this consultation process. SSC will use the information gathered to inform its subsequent procurement activities. This process will not result in the issuance of a solicitation or the award of a contract.

#### Submission Guidelines:

No bid submissions will be accepted. Suppliers are not required to reserve stock or facilities, nor allocate resources, as a result of any information contained in this RFI.

#### Criteria:

The procurement of goods and services will be based on SSC's procurement policies and procedures. SSC will not consider any bid that is not submitted in accordance with these policies and procedures.

#### Contact Information:

For any inquiries or consultations, please contact:

* Oliver Librada, SSC
* Phone: (343) 542-8460
* Email: oliver.librada@ssc-spc.gc.ca

**Attachments:**

The attachments are available at the following URLs:

English: <https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/5C44B52D-D777-4A53-A67A-F07F5B57606F>
French: <https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download/47BA5EA3-9818-4244-A1D4-A5F009F388C3> 

This rewritten version carefully maintains the accuracy and details of the original document while ensuring clarity and professionalism. All irrelevant and unnecessary details from the contractor's entry have been removed. Links to attachments are provided so readers can easily access the required information.
